attributes.action: Leave the EU as the country democratically voted without a deal on March 29th
attributes.additional_details: The whole Brexit fiasco is exactly that. A fiasco! People aren’t buying in to the scaremongering in which you are selling. The United Kingdom prospered and thrived for century’s, long before being the EU. Many people worrying about the economy. We are one of the biggest in the world. If the EU wants to bully us in to a comer with threats of delays and tarriffs, bring it on as there’s a big world out there to trade with, not just a select group of self centred dictators!
attributes.background: In June 2016 myself and 17.4 million other fellow citizens voted to leave the EU. On the ballot paper there were 2 option. Remain or Leave. At no point was there an option for half arsed deals that DOES NOT represent what the majority of voters asked for.
